title: BTCOVERFIATS
author: BTCOVERFIATS
created_time: January 26, 2023, 11:28:21 PMLast edit: February 22, 2023, 02:49:24 PM by BTCOVERFIATS
content: Hi everyone! Looking to sell this Squirrelbits 1 of 2 Burn It All Fuckin Down TI slab. This is the coolest piece in my collection so I am not in a rush to sell it, but wanted to put it up while some other things I had my eye on were available.Comes with the paired opendime which is not funded Price: .04 BTCEscrow if needed through Minerjones. Buyer pays shipping and escrow fees.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: That's great!! Good luck with your sale

comments.author: YodasRedRocket
comments.body: Fantastic flame thrower squirrel-soldier art on this one!¬† Good luck with your sale ‚úåüèº

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Amazing Squirrel-piece I haven't seen before.Do you have any info on when it was created?How does an opendime pairing work in this case?I guess you want the BTC, but in the unlikely case you want to trade shoot me a pm.

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on January 27, 2023, 10:44:02 AMAmazing Squirrel-piece I haven't seen before.Do you have any info on when it was created?How does an opendime pairing work in this case?I guess you want the BTC, but in the unlikely case you want to trade shoot me a pm.Not interested in trading. The opendime contains the private key that no one knows until you punch the tiny hole on the device to sweep the funds. The QR code on the TI slab is the public address that is associated with the opendime This was not a public release. This was something that was offered to me by Liquid and I was very grateful I was given the chance to purchase. There are only 2 of these made and I believe the other one is colored yellow instead of purple. This is probably the only TI slab with this design you'll see out in the wild.

That's why I didn't load it, scared I would lose the opendime or it would end up getting bit-rot 15-20 years from now and wouldn't be able to move the funds.
